title: Cat and Jemima J: A Short Story
description: From New York Times bestselling author Jane Green comes Cat and Jemima J, a free ebook original short story.Featuring Jemima, the main character from Green's beloved novel Jemima J, and Cat, the main character from her novel Summer Secrets. Fans of these popular characters will be delighted to see them sharing the pages of Green's engrossing short story.
author: Jane Green
